summary: This is an email regarding a document request related to Tartaglione, forwarded as part of the Epstein case document set. It appears to be official correspondence, possibly from the Bureau of Prisons, concerning a request for documents.
keyFacts: The document is an email dated December 14, 2020, concerning a 'Tartaglione document request'.
The email appears to originate from or be forwarded through a Bureau of Prisons (BOP) email system, as indicated by the domain 'SMTPI.BOP.GOV'.
The subject 'Tartaglione document request' suggests a request for documents related to an individual named Tartaglione, likely in a legal or investigative context.
The document is part of the Epstein case document set, indicating a potential connection or relevance to the Jeffrey Epstein investigation.
The email is forwarded or embedded as a file named 'RE:_Tartaglione_document_request.msg'.
